Articles.Content: Okay so I can't install Mechjeb, I have Windows 10 if that helps. Also I didn't get KSP on Steam if that helps too. I tried placing it in the GameData folder and Squad folder but neither worked. Any ideas? My version is 1.3

Directions for Mechjeb have been posted and tested. windows 10 is fine. nothing should go in the squad folder make sure your structure is ::Kerbal Space Program\GameData\MechJeb2 with the extracted files and folder below this/bundles../icons../parts../plugins.. and license.md are present. 

hope this helps

Jammer-TD

Edited December 22, 2017 by Jammer-TD
post had miss info contained

If you're still having trouble, Try the Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (CKAN). I use it myself. Think of it as an automated library of mods (Mechjeb included), you type in what mod you want, and click install. It places the mod where it's supposed to go.

https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/CKAN/releases/tag/v1.22.6

 

Hope this helps you!
Okay guys thanks! Got it working.
